description:
An advanced sock that looks good and feels better. With full cushioning and a stretchy fit, you’ll wear these from the slopes to bed in complete comfort.

  • 4 Degree Elite Fit System combines two elastics for stretch and recovery to keep the socks in place
  • Indestructawool™ blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Virtually Seamless™ toe to keep your toes comfy while you shred the slopes
  • Narrower profile is designed to fit those with narrower feet
  • Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management
name: Smartwool Ski Full Cushion Snowpocalypse Pattern OTC Socks - Women's
